column4: That looks like your video driver is crapping out.  It could be caused by a bad driver or by bad hardware.  Try disabling OpenGL screensavers.
will do.  thanks.  Think I should also upgrade to 10.04 or should I try disabling OpenGL screensavers and see if I go a few days w/o hanging?
Definitely use Lucid.  That i7 that you've got is new and recent drivers are much better.
